item.title: An Overview of 5G Networking
item.description: from https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-ietf-teas-5g-ns-ip-mpls/ B.1. Key Building Blocks # [TS-23.501] defines the Network Functions (UPF, Access and Mobility Function (AMF), etc.) that compose the 5G System (5GS) Architecture together with related interfaces (e.g., N1 and N2). This architecture has built-in control and user plane separation, and the control plane leverages a Service- Based Architecture (SBA).
